FAQ for Vendors

Find answers to common questions about partnering with GoSnel as a restaurant

How do I register my restaurant with GoSnel?

Visit our vendor signup page and complete the registration form with your restaurant details, business license, and menu information. Our team will review and approve your application within 24-48 hours.

What commission does GoSnel charge?

Our commission structure is competitive and transparent, typically ranging from 15-25% depending on your restaurant's location and order volume. Contact our business team for detailed pricing information specific to your restaurant.

How quickly do I receive payments?

Payments are processed weekly and transferred to your registered bank account within 3-5 business days. You can track all your earnings and payment history through the vendor dashboard.

Can I update my menu and prices anytime?

Yes, you have full control over your menu and pricing through the vendor dashboard. Changes are reflected on the platform in real-time, allowing you to manage availability, update prices, and add new items instantly.

What support is available if I have issues?

We provide 24/7 vendor support through multiple channels including phone, email, and in-app chat. Our dedicated business team is also available to help with account management, optimization strategies, and operational challenges.

Do you provide delivery drivers or do I need my own?

GoSnel provides a network of verified delivery drivers. You don't need to worry about delivery logistics - our drivers will pick up orders from your restaurant and deliver them to customers. All delivery is handled by our platform.

How does the AI recommendation system work for my restaurant?

Our AI analyzes customer preferences, order history, and dining patterns to recommend your dishes to the right customers at the right time. This increases your visibility and order volume by connecting you with customers who are most likely to enjoy your cuisine.

Can I set my own delivery areas and operating hours?

Absolutely! You have full control over your delivery radius, operating hours, and availability. You can adjust these settings anytime through your vendor dashboard to match your restaurant's capacity and business hours.

Still Have Questions?

Our business team is here to help you succeed with GoSnel
